attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I was just trying to support my black and lgbtq+ friends so i downloaded this app to see if it could do anything for me. Yeah it didn’t. This app is anti blm and extremely homophobic. Take this off the app store so that no one has to go thru this terror.

attributes.title: destroyed my FAMILY 😩
attributes.review: upon downloading this app (after a week of waiting for it to download) my dad left us 😭 my mom was diagnosed with stage 4 heart cancer, all 11 of my siblings had strokes, my bird flew away, my dogs ate my cats and my horse ate my dogs 🤯😭😖 this app has destroyed my family and my life DO NOT DOWNLOAD !!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible!!! It took so long to download only to find out I could just text a NUMBER!? This is so not worth it!!!!! I can’t believe I even CONSIDERED this app!!!!!😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 and I thought “well maybe it’s worth it” IT GLITCHED SOO HARRRDDDDD!!!!! I can’t believe this app 0/10 would not recomend!!!

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE (DO NOT DOWNLOAD)
attributes.review: I went to download this app like I would any other. When I opened it, it made me put my phone number in. There was no way around it. Now I am getting alerts every ten minutes. If I could give this app no stars, believe me, I would.

attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review: This app is extremely disappointing I mean taking 17 hours 32 minutes and 6 seconds to download is way to long. And the app is confusing and weird. If any app should be taken down it should be this. Good day

attributes.title: Worst App EVER!!!
attributes.review: This app rebooted my entire phone and I lost EVERYTHING!! The actual fact that there are people who really voted for a walking cheetoh to run America!! What has the world come to?! This is very concerning for the future. If this cheetoh wins next election I’m going to sue...(but i’ll make it 🧚🏽aside🧚🏽)

I downloaded this app expecting the best. As soon as I put my phone number in, I got a text in Russian telling me to burn my tax returns! It’s crazy! It hacked my phone and changed every button I clicked to the opposite of the one I wanted. I’m very dissatisfied with this app.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Took literally weeks to download and after it was downloaded I think it mined my data because I’d keep giving me very specific threats trying to coerce me to vote for trump. 0/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: The app hacked my phone and I have to now spend 300 dollars to fix it and now it gave out my phone number to every site imaginable do NOT download the app you might get raped if it gives out your address

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: First of all the app is disgusting created by a disgusting human being and second of all it hacked my phone and deleted all my apps and hacked my iCloud it stole all of my personal information and I had to get a whole new phone so trump 🖕🏾🖕🏾
